bodyTemplate:
Hi {{firstName}}!

As is tradition, registration for KUTC opens at Easter, and as a participant in the last three years, you are hereby given the opportunity to register before we announce to the general public that registration is open.

This year, I have created a new registration system, and it is still in a beta version. Therefore, I would appreciate hearing from you if you encounter any problems with registration or have suggestions for improvements.

You can register by visiting https://runnershub.krultra.no.

Hope to see you at the starting line again on October 11th this year!

Best regards,
KrUltra

This email was sent to {{email}}. If you did not register for this event, please ignore this email.

Dear {{firstName}},

Your registration for {{eventName}} {{eventEdition}} is about to expire. Please note that payment was due within 7 days of registration and is now overdue. If we do not receive your payment within the next 24 hours, your registration will automatically be marked as expired.

Payment Information

Amount Due: {{paymentRequired}} NOK

Payment Options:

  • Vipps/MobilePay: (+47) 913 51 909
  • Bank Transfer: KrUltra, account no. 9802 46 25850
  • International Transfer:
    IBAN: NO61 9802 4625850
    BIC/SWIFT: DNBANOKKXXX

Payment Reference: {{eventShortName}}-{{eventEdition}}-{{registrationNumber}}

If you believe you have already paid and it hasn’t been reflected yet, please reply to this email to let us know. If your payment was made recently, your registration should be updated to “confirmed” shortly, and you will receive a confirmation email. You can check or update your registration anytime at the KrUltra Runners Hub.

Please contact us immediately if you think this message was sent in error.

Best regards,
KrUltra

This email was sent to {{email}}. If you did not register for this event, please disregard this message.

KrUltra Newsletter

Hello {{firstName}},

Hope to bring you more relevant updates and news in the future!

Best regards,
KrUltra

This email was sent to {{email}}. If you do not want to receive future newsletters from KrUltra or any of the KrUltra events, please reply and start your message with "UNSUBSCRIBE".

Hi {{firstName}}!

Your registration has been moved from the participants list to the waiting-list for {{eventName}} {{eventEdition}}.

Important: If you think this change is uncorrect, please notify us by replying to this email immediately.

Best regards,
KrUltra

This email was sent to {{email}}. If you did not register for this event, please ignore this email.

KUTC 2025 Payment Confirmation

Hello {{firstName}},

We have received your payment for Kruke's Ultra-Trail Challenge 2025. Thank you!

Payment Details

Registration #: {{registrationNumber}}

Payment Reference: {{editionId}}-{{registrationNumber}}

Amount Paid: {{paymentMade}} NOK

Payment Date: {{today}}

Registration Status: {{status}}

Your spot in the event is now confirmed. We look forward to seeing you at the start line!

Best regards,
KrUltra

This email was sent to {{email}}. If you did not register for this event, please ignore this email.

Dear {{firstName}},

We would like to inform you that your payment for {{eventName}} {{eventEdition}} has been refunded in accordance with the event’s cancellation and refund policy.

Refund Information

Unless you have agreed differently, your refund has been processed and sent to the same payment method used for your original transaction.

For most payment methods, other than bank transfers, the refund should appear almost immediately. In case of an international bank transfer, please allow a few business days for the transaction to be completed.

If you have any questions or believe something is incorrect, feel free to reply to this email.

Best regards,
KrUltra

This email was sent to {{email}} in connection with your registration for {{eventName}} {{eventEdition}}.

Dear {{firstName}}

We want to inform you that your registration for {{eventName}} {{eventEdition}} has been cancelled.

Please reply to this email if you have any questions or objections that you want to air with us.

Best regards,
KrUltra

This email was sent to {{email}}. If you did not register for this event, please ignore this email.

Dear {{firstName}}

We want to inform you that your registration for {{eventName}} {{eventEdition}} has expired.

Possible reasons for the expiry can be missing payments, or that the expiry date for the registration has been reached in case of a waiting-list entry. Any refunds for possible payments you have made for this event will be conducted in line with the events regulations.

Important: Please reply to this email immediately to notify us if you think the expiration is a mistake!

Best regards,
KrUltra

This email was sent to {{email}}. If you did not register for this event, please ignore this email.

Hello {{firstName}},

Your registration for {{eventName}} {{eventEdition}} has been updated successfully.

Updated Registration Details

Registration #: {{registrationNumber}}

Name: {{firstName}} {{lastName}}

Email: {{email}}

Date of Birth: {{dateOfBirth}}

Nationality: {{nationality}}

Phone: {{phoneCountryCode}} {{phoneNumber}}

Race Distance: {{raceDistance}}

{{#if representing}}

Representing: {{representing}}

{{/if}} {{#if travelRequired}}

Travel Required: {{travelRequired}}

{{/if}} {{#if comments}}

Comments: {{comments}}

{{/if}}

Last Updated: {{updatedAt}}

If you did not make these changes or have any questions, please contact us at post@krultra.no.

Best regards,
KrUltra

This email was sent to {{email}}. If you did not register for this event, please ignore this email.

Hi {{firstName}}!

This is a kind remider that you need to fulfill your payment obligations in order to keep your registration for {{eventName}} {{eventEdition}}. Please note that payment is mandatory within 7 days of registration.

Payment Information

Total Amount Due: {{paymentRequired}} NOK

Payment Methods:

  • Vipps/MobilePay: (+47) 913 51 909
  • Bank Transfer: KrUltra, account number 9802 46 25850
  • International Payments
    IBAN: NO61 9802 4625850
    BIC/SWIFT: DNBANOKKXXX

Payment Reference: {{eventShortName}}-{{eventEdition}}-{{registrationNumber}}

If you have changed your mind about participating, please let us know as soon as possible by replying to this email.

Best regards,
KrUltra

This email was sent to {{email}}. If you did not register for this event, please ignore this email.

Dear {{firstName}}

We want to inform you that the status for your registration for {{eventName}} {{eventEdition}} has changed.

Please review your registration data at the KrUltra Runners Hub to confirm that your registration is correct. You can see your status if you go to the participants/waiting-list overview for the relevant {{ eventShortName }} event.

Unless your new status is 'Confirmed', you may need to take action in order to secure your registration.

Please reply to this email if you have questions or think the status change is a mistake.

Best regards,
KrUltra

This email was sent to {{email}}. If you did not register for this event, please ignore this email.

Hi {{firstName}}!

Congratulations - you have been upgraded from the waiting-list to the participants list for {{eventName}} {{eventEdition}}!

If you for some reason can't or don't want to participate in the event after all, please let us know as soon as possible so we can make the spot available for someone else.

Hope to see you at the start line on race day!

Best regards,
KrUltra

This email was sent to {{email}}. If you did not register for this event, please ignore this email.

{{eventShortName}} {{eventEdition}} Payment Confirmation

Hello {{firstName}},

We have received your payment for {{eventName}} {{eventEdition}}. Thank you!

Payment Details

Registration #: {{registrationNumber}}

Payment Reference: {{editionId}}-{{registrationNumber}}

Amount Paid: {{paymentMade}} NOK

Payment Date: {{today}}

Registration Status: {{status}}

Your spot on the waiting-list for the event is now confirmed. We will notify you immediately if you are promoted to the participants list. If you're not promoted before {{formatDate waitinglistExpires}}, your registration will expire and you will be refunded your payment.

Please note that you can change the expiry date and other details of your registration by visiting Runners Hub.

Best regards,
KrUltra

This email was sent to {{email}}. If you did not register for this event, please ignore this email.

{{eventShortName}} {{eventEdition}} Waiting-List Registration

Hello {{firstName}},

Thank you for entering the waiting-list for {{eventName}} {{eventEdition}}! Here are your registration details:

  • Registration #: {{registrationNumber}}
  • Name: {{firstName}} {{lastName}}
  • Email: {{email}}
  • Date of Birth: {{dateOfBirth}}
  • Nationality: {{nationality}}
  • Phone: {{phoneCountryCode}} {{phoneNumber}}
  • Race Distance: {{raceDistance}}
    • {{#if representing}}
  • Representing: {{representing}}
    • {{/if}} {{#if travelRequired}}
  • Travel Required: {{travelRequired}}
    • {{/if}} {{#if comments}}
  • Comments: {{comments}}
    • {{/if}}

The status for your registration is currently {{status}}. Once we register your payment, your registration will be confirmed and you will be in contention for free spots that become available.

Payment Information

Total Amount Due: {{paymentRequired}} NOK

Payment Methods:

  • Vipps/MobilePay: (+47) 913 51 909
  • Bank Transfer: KrUltra, account number 9802 46 25850
  • International Payments
    IBAN: NO61 9802 4625850
    BIC/SWIFT: DNBANOKKXXX

Payment Reference: {{eventShortName}}-{{eventEdition}}-{{registrationNumber}}

You can see your position on the waiting-list at the event's registration overview.

Your registration is set to expire on {{ waitinglistExpires }}. You can at any time change the expiry date and get a full refund by editing your registration data at KrUltra Runners Hub. You will find the waiting-list expiry date on the last review page for your registration.

Best regards,
KrUltra

This email was sent to {{email}}. If you did not register for this event, please ignore it.

{{eventShortName}} {{eventEdition}} Registration

Hello {{firstName}},

Thank you for signing up to {{eventName}} {{eventEdition}}! Here are your registered details:

  • Registration #: {{registrationNumber}}
  • Name: {{firstName}} {{lastName}}
  • Email: {{email}}
  • Date of Birth: {{dateOfBirth}}
  • Nationality: {{nationality}}
  • Phone: {{phoneCountryCode}} {{phoneNumber}}
  • Race Distance: {{raceDistance}}
    • {{#if representing}}
  • Representing: {{representing}}
    • {{/if}} {{#if travelRequired}}
  • Travel Required: {{travelRequired}}
    • {{/if}} {{#if comments}}
  • Comments: {{comments}}
    • {{/if}}

Your registration is currently {{status}}. Once we receive your payment, your participation will be confirmed.

Payment Information

Total Amount Due: {{paymentRequired}} NOK

Payment Methods:

  • Vipps/MobilePay: (+47) 913 51 909
  • Bank Transfer: KrUltra, account number 9802 46 25850
  • International Payments
    IBAN: NO61 9802 4625850
    BIC/SWIFT: DNBANOKKXXX

Payment Reference: {{eventShortName}}-{{eventEdition}}-{{registrationNumber}}

Please complete your payment within 7 days to secure your spot.

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us at post@krultra.no.

Looking forward to seeing you at the event!

Best regards,
KrUltra

This email was sent to {{email}}. If you did not register for this event, please ignore this email.
